orthopedic.title: Advanced Orthopedic Care
orthopedic.subtitle: Experience cutting-edge orthopedic treatments tailored to your needs. Our comprehensive approach combines advanced technology with expert care to address joint pain, sports injuries, and musculoskeletal conditions, helping you regain mobility and improve your quality of life.

complementary.title: Complementary Medicine
complementary.subtitle: Discover the perfect harmony of traditional healing wisdom and modern medical science. Our integrative approach combines evidence-based complementary therapies with conventional treatments, offering you a holistic path to wellness that addresses both symptoms and root causes.

personalized.title: Personalized Treatment Plans
personalized.subtitle: Your health journey is unique, and so should be your treatment. We develop comprehensive, individualized care plans that consider your specific conditions, lifestyle, and goals. Our patient-centered approach ensures you receive the most effective and appropriate care for your situation.

AboutSection.title: About Dr. Cüneyt Tamam
AboutSection.introduction: Born in Mersin in 1971, I have dedicated over two decades to the field of Orthopedics and Traumatology. My career has been focused on integrating traditional medical practices with cutting-edge complementary therapies to provide comprehensive care for my patients.

items.quote: I have been going to a doctor regularly for 3 weeks, a brother, a friend, I can say with all my sincerity that he is one of the best doctors in Mersin, his vision is health first, then money, thank you very much for your interest and concern (functional medicine)
items.name: Canan Yılmaz

items.quote: After years of chronic back pain and trying various treatments, I finally found relief with Dr. Tamam. His approach was different - he took the time to understand my lifestyle, work habits, and medical history. The combination of traditional orthopedic treatment with complementary therapies made all the difference. It's been 8 months now, and I can finally play with my grandchildren again!
items.name: Mehmet Aydın

items.quote: I was skeptical about acupuncture at first, but after a sports injury that wouldn't heal properly, I decided to give it a try. Dr. Tamam explained everything so clearly and made me feel at ease. Three sessions in, and the improvement was remarkable. His holistic approach to treatment really works. I'm back to playing football with no pain!
items.name: Ali Kaya

items.quote: Following a car accident, I had severe neck pain that traditional treatments couldn't fix. A friend recommended Dr. Tamam, and it was the best medical advice I've ever received. His neural therapy sessions, combined with his expertise in orthopedics, helped me recover completely. What stands out is how he treats you like family, not just another patient.
items.name: Zeynep Demir

About.bornInMersin: I was born in Mersin in 1971.
About.graduatedFromTarsus: I graduated from Tarsus American High School in 1989 and continued my education at Gülhane Military Medical Academy Faculty of Medicine.
About.graduatedFromGulhane: I graduated from Gülhane Military Medical Academy Faculty of Medicine in 1996. In 2003, I completed my specialization training at GATA Haydarpaşa Training Hospital Orthopedics and Traumatology Clinic and started working as an orthopedics and traumatology specialist.
About.interestedInComplementaryMedicine: I became interested in Complementary Medicine starting in 2010. I received training in the fields of neural therapy, prolotherapy, acupuncture and microsystem acupuncture (Ear, Yamamato Siener).
About.receivedInternationalNeuralTherapyCertif: In 2013, I received the International Neural Therapy certificate from the International Federation of Medical Associations of Neural Therapy.
About.workedWithProfPoehling: After working in different hospitals of the Turkish Armed Forces, I had the opportunity to work with Prof. Dr. G. Gary Poehling on arthroscopic surgery and robotic surgery at Wake Forest University School of Medicine in the USA for one year with a scholarship from the Land Forces Command in 2012. I received training in microsurgery, arthroscopic surgery (shoulder, knee, hip and ankle) and robotic surgery at Wake Forest University.
About.completedMakoPlastyTraining: In June of 2012, I completed training for MAKOplasty (Robotic Knee and Hip Replacement) in Ft. Laurdale, Florida.
About.workedAtHarvard: After retiring from the Turkish Armed Forces with the rank of Tbp. Colonel in February 2016, I worked at Harvard University/ Harris Orthopaedic Biomechanics and Biomaterials Laboratory, Massachusetts General Hospital until December 2016.
About.completedCertificatesAtYildirimBeyazit: I completed the Prolotherapy, Mesotherapy, Cupping, Ozonetherapy, Phytotherapy and Acupuncture Certificate programs at Yıldırım Beyazıt University Traditional and Complementary Medicine Application and Research Center.
About.currentlyWorkingAtToros: I am currently working as a faculty member at Toros University.
About.providesHealingInPrivatePractice: I provide healing to my patients in my private practice.

About.turkishOrthopedicsAward2017: 2017 – Turkish Orthopedics and Traumatology Association Bone and Soft Tissue Tumors Best Oral Presentation Award – 27th National Turkish Orthopedics and Traumatology Congress – Prognostic Significance of Maximum Standardized Uptake Value in FDG PET/CT in Bone and Soft Tissue Sarcomas

About.turkishOrthopedicsAward2011: 2011 – Turkish Orthopedics and Traumatology Association General Orthopedics Best Oral Presentation Award – 22nd National Turkish Orthopedics and Traumatology Congress – The Diagnostic Effiency of Dynamic Doppler Ultrasound in Chronic Exertional Compartment Syndrome
